title: Arque Municipality
text:
Arque Municipality is the first <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Bolivia">municipal section</a> of the <a href="Arque%20Province">Arque Province</a> in the <a href="Cochabamba%20Department">Cochabamba Department</a>, <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>. Its seat is <a href="Arque">Arque</a>. At the time of census 2001 the municipality had 11,806 inhabitants.<ref name="<a href="http%3A//www.ine.gov.bo"></a>"> <a href="http%3A//www.ine.gov.bo">Instituto Nacional de Estadística Bolivia (INE) 2001</a> (Spanish)</ref> It has the lowest HDI of Bolivia with 0.311.

Languages.
The languages spoken in the Arque Municipality are mainly <a href="Quechua%20languages">Quechua</a> and <a href="Spanish%20language">Spanish</a>.
